verbs.description: Mike Gibbons [V: has] long been a supporter of President Trump . But as Tuesday 's primary approaches , the president is supporting Gibbons ' opponent , Jim Renacci , for U.S. Senate .

[ARG1: Mike Gibbons] has [ARGM-TMP: long] [V: been] [ARG2: a supporter of President Trump] . But as Tuesday 's primary approaches , the president is supporting Gibbons ' opponent , Jim Renacci , for U.S. Senate .
Mike Gibbons has long been a supporter of President Trump . But as Tuesday 's primary approaches , the president [V: is] supporting Gibbons ' opponent , Jim Renacci , for U.S. Senate .
